title: Portfolio Website
description: I developed a personal portfolio website using React and CSS. The website showcased my skills, experience, and previous projects. The site included a responsive layout and utilized modern web design techniques to create an engaging user experience.

title: Django-React-Notes-App
description: A React-Django note app integrates a dynamic React front-end with a robust Django back-end to create a seamless, efficient note-taking application. This full-stack project showcases my skills in modern web development

title: E-commerce Website
description: A Django e-commerce website demonstrates my ability to develop robust, scalable online shopping platforms, featuring functionalities such as user authentication, product management, and secure payment processing.
